entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:29 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 04:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -37.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -41.4°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
